member.name: T:NotesToGoogle.NotesToGoogleSync
member.summary: NotesToGoogleSync class extends the Thread class. It is run as an extra thread and is responsible for the actual syncing between Notes and Google.

member.name: T:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect
member.summary: The GoogleServiceConnect class is used to make connections to google calendar; it can be used to: view, add, delete, update calendars and calendar entries

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates GoogleServiceConnect object, chained to constructor.

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates GoogleServiceConnect object, chained to constructor.

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates GoogleServiceConnect object.

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.CreateCalendar(System.String)
member.summary: CreateCalendar is used to create a new calendar to the owners profile.
member.returns: CalendarEntry object of the new calendar

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.DeleteCalendar(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a calendar with the specified name.

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.ClearEventEntriesBySearch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method used to clear out all Lotus Notes specific entries; Lotus notes specific entries are denoted by a NL: in the subject field. Calendar entries will only be deleted if they contain the string 'Created from [LNotes]'; so when creating new entries FROM Lotus ensure that this string is somewhere within the data.
member.param: String to search entries for to delete

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.ClearEventEntriesBySearch(System.String)
member.summary: Method used to clear out all Lotus Notes specific entries; Lotus notes specific entries are denoted by a NL: in the subject field. Calendar entries will only be deleted if they contain the string 'Created from [LNotes]'; so when creating new entries FROM Lotus ensure that this string is somewhere within the data.
member.param: Search string to choose entries to delete

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.BatchAddEvents(Google.GData.Calendar.CalendarEntry,System.Collections.Generic.List{Google.GData.Calendar.EventEntry})
member.summary: Method used to add a number of events to
member.returns: Whether or not the batch add worked properly

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.GetCalendarByName(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the calendar entry object by the specified name

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.TestConnection
member.summary: Test the connection to the GoogleService
member.returns: returns True for success, false for failure

member.name: M:NotesToGoogle.GoogleServiceConnect.GetAlternateURL(Google.GData.Calendar.CalendarEntry)
member.summary: Method used to return the Alternate Link string value. This URL is required when doing any type of searching.
member.param: CalendarEntry to return alternate link for.

member.summary: Method used to insert a calendar entry into the specified calendar.
member.param: Event Entry to add to calendar
Calendar name to insert event into
